title: Applying Systematic Instructional Design (ID) Models to Academic Library Education Design

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Customized curriculum design course for current professionals, providing mobile learning environments utilizing digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can design an academic library education program by applying the five stages of the ADDIE model
Learners can adapt educational content and methods to situational contexts based on learner analysis
Learners can develop and evaluate educational materials using an ID model in collaborative environments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
